price: 268. Sheytan cinnaanee kee tuddagnal sin meesiisaah Qaxuma taamoomih sin Amrisa, Yalli isin Abtaanah tanin Acwal dambi cabtii kee isi rizqhiy kaak yanil sin xagnisa, Yallih muxxo farakka-leeh isi Naqoosah taamoomii kee ken Niyaayit tanim yaaxigi kinni.
arabic: ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ يَعِدُكُمُ ٱلۡفَقۡرَ وَيَأۡمُرُكُم بِٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعِدُكُم مَّغۡفِرَةٗ مِّنۡهُ وَفَضۡلٗاۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
